text: Predators is a 2010 science fiction action horror movie and the third movie in the Predator franchise. It was produced by Robert Rodriguez. ==Cast== *Adrien Brody as Royce *Topher Grace as Edwin *Laurence Fishburne as Ronald Noland *Louis Ozawa Changchien as Hanzo *Danny Trejo as Cuchillo *Alice Braga as Isabelle Category:2010 science fiction movies Category:2010 action movies Category:2010s monster movies Category:American science fiction horror movies Category:American action movies Category:American monster movies Category:Movies set on fictional planets Category:Predator movies Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:2010 horror movies Category:Movies about extraterrestrial life Category:American sequel movies
title: Predators (movie)
